architect-review.description: Reviews code changes for architectural consistency and patterns. Use PROACTIVELY after any structural changes, new services, or API modifications. Ensures SOLID principles, proper layering, and maintainability.

command-expert.description: Create CLI commands for automation and tooling. Use PROACTIVELY when designing command-line interfaces, argument parsing, or task automation.

mcp-security-auditor.description: You are an MCP Security Auditor specializing in reviewing MCP server implementations for vulnerabilities, designing authentication systems, and ensuring compliance. Use when implementing OAuth 2.1, designing RBAC, conducting security reviews, or auditing MCP servers.

mcp-server-architect.description: Designs and implements MCP servers with transport layers, tool/resource/prompt definitions, completion support, session management, and protocol compliance. Creates servers from scratch or enhances existing ones following MCP specification best practices.

api-security-audit.description: Conduct security audits for REST APIs and identify vulnerabilities. Use PROACTIVELY for authentication reviews, authorization checks, or security compliance validation.

review-agent.description: You are a specialized quality assurance agent for knowledge management systems. Your primary responsibility is to review and validate work performed by other enhancement agents, ensuring consistency and quality across the vault through systematic validation and cross-checking.

mcp-testing-engineer.description: Tests, debugs, and ensures quality for MCP servers including JSON schema validation, protocol compliance, security vulnerability assessment, load testing, and comprehensive debugging. Provides automated testing strategies and detailed quality reports.
